content: By: Jo O'Reilly February 14, 2024 Why Building Links with Digital PR Is Hard — And That’s OK! Public Relations | Link Building Learn about why building links with digital PR is so hard, and understand what you can do to take the pressure off. Read this post By: Stephanie Wallace January 24, 2024 Breaking News: ‘PR Critical to SEO Success’ Is Not Breaking News Public Relations | Content Marketing The intertwining of PR and SEO is not groundbreaking news; it's an established strategy for success in the digital age. Learn more in this article with Stephanie Wallace. Read this post By: Amber Buonsenso January 9, 2024 Driving Sales with Digital PR: What E-commerce Brands Need to Know Public Relations | Link Building When done correctly, digital public relations enables brands to elevate their presence in online news publications while boosting website authority with a relevant, growing backlink profile. Learn more in this article. Read this post By: Iona Townsley November 27, 2023 When Not to Use Artificial Intelligence in Digital PR Public Relations | Marketing Industry | AI and SEO In the field of public relations, the human touch remains essential and irreplaceable. Learn when not to use artificial intelligence in digital PR. Read this post By: Kelsey Libert July 31, 2023 How To Earn High-Authority Links That Drive Rankings Link Building | Public Relations | SEO Consulting Learn about the importance of digital PR and link-building in this article by Kelsey Libert. Discover how can you consistently earn media coverage, while avoiding spammy link networks. Read this post By: Rebecca Moss May 1, 2023 How to Use Digital PR to Improve E-E-A-T Signals Public Relations | Search Engines | Link Building In this post, Rebecca shares the digital PR tactics you can use to help to improve your E-E-A-T signals, explains why building trust and credibility needs to be at the top of your list if you want to have greater visibility in the search engine results, and ends with success stories that showcase how these tactics have led to commercial gains for brands in typically untrusted sectors. Read this post By: Domenica D'Ottavio November 9, 2022 Study: Which Link Metric Correlates Closest to Organic Visibility? Link Building | Public Relations Since 2019, Google has acknowledged that it uses Natural Language Understanding (NLU) when understanding the relevancy and intent of users' search queries. So why is no one measuring relevance when it comes to link profiles? The team at Journey Further sought to do just that – and in their latest study, they demonstrate why link relevance is more important than ever. Read this post By: Jo O'Reilly November 7, 2022 How to E-A-T Ethically with Digital PR Public Relations | On-page SEO | Branding When done right, digital PR can deliver a range of benefits for both SEO and brand awareness, but building trust both with search engines and consumers takes time and consistency. In this piece, Jo goes through some examples of best PR practice, as well as how to avoid common pitfalls. Read this post By: Rebecca Moss March 1, 2022 The Four Pillars of Relevancy: How Digital PR Campaigns Can Lead to Gains in Every Sector Content Marketing | Public Relations Rebecca explains how a relevant digital PR campaign can lead to commercial gain, and takes you through the steps to get there. Read this post By: Andy Crestodina January 21, 2022 Influencer Marketing for SEO and Authority Whiteboard Friday | Public Relations Please welcome back guest host, Andy Crestodina, for an episode all about the connection between people, relationships, and SEO outcomes. Specifically, how influencer marketing can drive SEO and authority. Read this post By: Amanda Milligan November 12, 2021 How to Make Newsworthy Content: Part 2 Whiteboard Friday | Content Marketing | Public Relations Content marketing expert Amanda Milligan is back with three more ways to make your content more newsworthy. Read this post By: Christopher Long September 21, 2021 The Ultimate Guide to Digital PR Link Building | Content Marketing | Public Relations The team at Go Fish Digital shares their strategies for building links through digital PR. Read this post By: Amanda Milligan June 18, 2021 How to Make Newsworthy Content Content Marketing | Whiteboard Friday | Public Relations Ahead of her MozCon Virtual 2021 presentation, Amanda Milligan shows you what it takes to make your content newsworthy, in order to attract links. Read this post By: Domenica D'Ottavio April 8, 2021 Earn Press Coverage for Your Brand in 5 Steps [Case Study] Content Marketing | Link Building | Public Relations In this post, Domenica shows you how her team at Fractl earned top-tier press coverage and backlinks for a client in five simple steps, and how you can apply these same steps to your own brand's content.
